name: skill_rating_mw_2_ranked
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cod_api_2_0.
Tool description: Provides an easy access to the COD api leaderboard endpoints.
API description: Fetches the Skill Ratings of the top players ranked in Modern Warfare 2 (MW 2) leaderboard.

limit.description: Maximum number of top-ranked players to retrieve, defaults to '250'. Must be a number between 1 and 250.
